pkgmetadata.longdescription: aws-requests================making AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 signed HTTP calls with requests python:: from awsrequests import AwsRequester req = AwsRequester("us-west-2") req.get("http://myapigateway.whatever.com/") req.post("http://myapigateway.whatever.com/",json=dict(my="data")Credentials------AwsRequester can either have a key and secret passed in, or it will try to find creds in the same way boto3 would.
